text: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

translation.en: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved
translation.id: (Katakanlah, "Pada hari kemenangan662) itu, tidak berguna lagi bagi orang-orang kafir keimanan mereka dan mereka tidak diberi penangguhan
